# Undefined Components

**API Collection**

Constants that denote that the value of a date component is undefined.

## Overview

For example, when an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSDateComponents] object is created as the result of calculating the distance in time between two dates represented by a particular calendar, the value for the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSCalendar/Unit/weekOfYear] component would be set to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSDateComponentUndefined].

## Constants

- **NSDateComponentUndefined**: Specifies a date component without a value.
- **NSUndefinedDateComponent**: Specifies a date component without a value.

## Validating a Date

- **isValidDate**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the current combination of properties represents a date which exists in the current calendar.
- **isValidDate(in:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the current combination of properties represents a date which exists in the specified calendar.
- **date**: The date calculated from the current components using the stored calendar.
